item.title: ndctl returns "error while loading shared libraries. libjson-c.so.2. cannot open shared object file. No such file or directory"
item.description: Applies To Linux ndctl utility Issue Executing the ndctl utility, with or without commands or options, returns the following missing library error: # ndctl --versionndctl: error while loading shared libraries: libjson-c.so.2: cannot open shared obj Cause The issue could be caused by one of the following issues: The json-c package is not installed A version mis-match between the json-c and ndctl. More recent versions of json-c deliver libjson-c.so.4 rather than libjson-c.
